ygData.subject: RE: Interesting Duel
ygData.msgSnippet: they fixed this back in beta.  any damage at all, like from our AE damage songs, will wake up lullabied mobs.  before they fixed it, i heard a rumor that a
ygData.messageBody:
they fixed this back in beta. any damage at all, like from our AE damage
songs, will wake up lullabied mobs. before they fixed it, i heard a rumor
that a couple bards went down to guk (not sure if upper or lower) and one
sang lullaby and the other DDD and got like 10 levels in one day hehe.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 12 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> One tactic I had hoped would be effective was using lullaby
> with CoD and
> the L48 song, but lullaby has no discernable effect on PC
> chars at all.
> This combo doesn't even seem to work all that well on mobs, which is
> really too bad as nodding them off while your dots kill them
> would be a
> nasty way to do them in.
